housing-numbers.notes: Plan proposes housing requirement range of 53,245-63,000 homes (1,902-2,250 per annum). The 63,000 figure represents the upper end/ambition target. Total housing supply is 62,825. Committed housing includes completions, sites under construction, planning permissions and existing allocations. Windfall includes small sites (<10 homes) and non-strategic brownfield sites.
